forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 60. West southwest wind 3 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
The day unfolds in Downtown San Francisco with a canvas of mostly sunny skies, the sunlight gently warming the air to a pleasant near 67 degrees. A delicate breeze stirs, coming from the west southwest, infusing a subtle energy into the atmosphere—just enough to keep one refreshed while enjoying a stroll through the city’s vibrant streets. As the clock advances toward afternoon, temperatures may slide to around 65, tenderly suggesting layers may be needed as the day evolves. Tonight, the clouds will gather, bringing a whisper of drizzling rain after 11 PM—the air will cool to a comfortable 60, ideal for those seeking solace in the hushed cityscape adorned by the late evening glow.

The current conditions appear amiable yet tinged with an unshakeable enchantment of San Francisco's marine layer. While the fog holds its secrets close, wrapping the hills and the bay in soft hues, one might venture to say this lends an ethereal quality to the bustling city below. It is a day perfect for snagging a hidden corner seat at a quaint café, perhaps indulging in a good book or engaging in compelling conversation, with your favorite warm drink by your side. Dress comfortably, perhaps with a light jacket layered over your attire, ready to embrace both the sun's shine and the evening’s chill as you wander through the delightful narratives spun across this iconic landscape.
